author: klichong
msg: Partial REST services implemented with JAX-RS for Person object.  REST operations now include addUser, updateUser, deleteUser, getUser, getAllUsers.  The WADL can be viewed at http://localhost:8080/webapp/resources/application.wadl.

author: rfeng
msg: Fix for TUSCANY-3077. Allow the thread pool for conversation manager to be shutdown

author: rfeng
msg: Fix for TUSCANY-3076. The DefaultWorkScheduler only has 10 threads in the pool and it causes deadlock. With this fix, it's default to a cached pool which expand/thrink on demand.
